The video was published on Facebook on O: 2019, during the same week as Typhoon Hagibis hit Japan, as reported by AFP.
The video has been viewed more than 880: 000 times and shared more than 7,500 times on Facebook.
A reverse image search on Google using a: 2011, with a Japanese-language caption referring to the "Great East Japan Earthquake" and the city of Ishinomaki, confirming that the video depicts a tsunami in Japan in 2011.
